title: Contact Us
subtitle:
We are busy beautifying our Bamboo Babes so we do ALL of our booking online!
Simply setup a profile on Schedulicity, select your service, provider, date + time and make sure you get your confirmation email - it's that simple.

Have a question for your stylist?

Email bamboohairsalon@gmail.com prior to your appointment and we will be happy to help.

If you are running a few minutes behind, please text (519) 588-8471 - no calls.

Because we run on a tight schedule, we can't guarantee that we can take you if you are more than 10 minutes late.
